titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Multicultural Food and Art Fest (University of Michigan) records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Multicultural Food and Art Fest (University of Michigan) records

archdesc.bioghist: The Multicultural Food and Art Fest was an annual celebration of diversity through food, visual, and performing arts. Founded in 1994 by staff from building services, by 1999 the event included over 100 volunteer chefs and an estimated 4000 participants.
archdesc.scopecontent: The collection consists of the records of the planning committee for the 1999 MFAF, held on June 10, 1999. Includes an Executive Summary report, budget, publicity, and other planning materials, planning committee minutes and correspondence, evaluation reports, and photographs of the Fest.
